originalTitle: At least 55 Ghanaians killed in Russia-Ukraine war, minister says
title: At least 55 Ghanaians killed in Russia-Ukraine war, minister says
content: This is the highest number of confirmed casualties from a single African country in the Ukraine-Russia war.

originalTitle: Former US diplomat sentenced to life for abusing two girls in Burkina Faso
title: Former US diplomat sentenced to life for abusing two girls in Burkina Faso
content: He used the girls' mother's life-threatening illness as an opportunity to demand sex, said the US Office of Public Affairs.

originalTitle: Epstein tried to buy a palace in Morocco days before his arrest in 2019
title: Epstein tried to buy a palace in Morocco days before his arrest in 2019
content: The disgraced financier was in talks to buy luxury abode Bin Ennakhi - but the purchase was never completed.

originalTitle: Despite antiwar MAGA wing, Trump gets Republican support for Iran strikes
title: Despite antiwar MAGA wing, Trump gets Republican support for Iran strikes
content: Conservative opposition to war on Iran remains minimal as hawks heap praise on Trump for bombing, killing Khamenei.

originalTitle: Netanyahu’s war? Analysts say Trump’s Iran strikes benefit Israel, not US
title: Netanyahu’s war? Analysts say Trump’s Iran strikes benefit Israel, not US
content: War with Iran contradicts the US president's own criticism of regime change policies in the Middle East, analysts say.

originalTitle: US strikes on Iran lead to renewed demands for war powers legislation
title: US strikes on Iran lead to renewed demands for war powers legislation
content: Democratic lawmakers have largely condemned the strikes on Iran, emphasising the lack of congressional approval.

originalTitle: Ayatollah Khamenei's iron grip on power in Iran comes to an end
title: Ayatollah Khamenei's iron grip on power in Iran comes to an end
content: Iranian state TV confirms the supreme leader has been killed on the first day of massive US and Israeli air strikes on the country.

originalTitle: What we know so far: Supreme Leader Khamenei killed, as Iran launches retaliatory strikes
title: What we know so far: Supreme Leader Khamenei killed, as Iran launches retaliatory strikes
content: Iran responds by launching missiles and drones towards Israel and four Gulf Arab countries that host US military bases.

originalTitle: Iran says US and Israel strikes hit school killing 108
title: Iran says US and Israel strikes hit school killing 108
content: There is no confirmation by the US or Israel of the strike on the school located near elite military troops.

originalTitle: Free-scoring Semenyo takes burden off Haaland
title: Free-scoring Semenyo takes burden off Haaland
content: Manchester City have often been accused of being too reliant on Erling Haaland this season. There are signs that could be changing.

originalTitle: Carrick not interested in personal Glasner duel
title: Carrick not interested in personal Glasner duel
content: Manchester United interim boss Michael Carrick comes up against one of the major contenders for the permanent job when Oliver Glasner's Crystal Palace go to Old Trafford on Sunday.

originalTitle: Celtic & Rangers face double jeopardy in derby like no other
title: Celtic & Rangers face double jeopardy in derby like no other
content: BBC Scotland chief sportswriter Tom English sets the scene going into a compelling Old Firm spectacle on Sunday.
